description: This file defines a custom theme for the application's UI using Jetpack Compose's Material Design 3 components. It includes a composable function 'MineKeeperTheme' that sets up a light color scheme with specific colors for primary, secondary, tertiary, background, surface, and text colors, which is applied to the MaterialTheme.

methods.name: MineKeeperTheme
methods.description: A composable function that applies a custom color scheme and theme to its content.
